body.name: YABBOQ Portable Wireless Mouse for Laptop, PC, MacBook, Desktop, 2023 Version 2.4G Computer Optical/Ergonomic Mouse 6 Buttons, 800/1200/1600 DPI, with USB Receiver - Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 1 hr 36 mins
FREE pickup Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 1 hr 36 mins
features: 【ERGONOMIC MOUSE】The YABBOQ mouse is designed with a simple and stylish curved profile, which provides excellent ergonomic fit and comfort, while your thumb rests comfortably on the thumb rest, relieving palm fatigue and preventing finger cramps.
【PLUG AND PLAY】Nano USB receiver is plug and play, easy to operate, no need to install any software or drivers, 2.4G wireless signal is sensitive and stable, and the mouse movement will not be stuck.

【MORE FUNCTION BUTTONS】In addition to the standard three buttons ，the wireless mouse adds previous/next button ，with DPI buttons and a non-slip scroll wheel ，bringing you more and faster surfing ，gaming and working experience.

【POWER-SAVING DESIGN】 The wireless mouse saves power immediately when it is idle, and automatically sleeps after 8 minutes of inactivity, so as to prolong the battery life. Press any key to wake up the mouse.

【Product Details】Package includes: 1 YABBOQ wireless mouse, 1 USB receiver (stored in the battery cover at the bottom of the mouse) and 1 user manual. Mouse weight: 2.82 ounces, product size: 4.41 × 2.84 × 1.62 inches, 800/1200/1600DPI 3-speed adjustable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: YABBOQ Wireless mouse for computer Wireless mouse with comfortable hand feeling. The mouse is designed according to the curve of the hand, use can relieve palm fatigue. YABBOQ wireless mouse, very easy to connect, USB receiver plug and play, no need to install the driverWireless mouse is suitable for all kinds of computer devices with USB ports, including desktop computers, laptopsYA100G wireless mouse with 3 DPI cycle adjustment, 800/1200/1600 respectively, you can adjust it according to your needs2.4G wireless mouse in the conventional 3-button based on the addition of the previous page / next page button, you can browse the web more efficiently

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is a good brand works well on laptops and Desk tops . I have had it a long time still working great i have changed the battery once in 8 months . So if you need this , this is the one and there is no Cord to deal with ,put it in a USB plug and start using..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprise find, hidden gem!
reviews.reviewText: This is a really comfortable mouse. Much better than many more expansive ones. The smoothness of the pointer movement is a little off, but not at all impact normal office usage. Definitely worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does not work on MAC all MACs, just some
reviews.reviewText: It is comfortable to hold. Click has a nice feel. It works ok on a PC, not great.But hardly works at all on the MAC mini. 7/8 of the time the cursor doesn't move or select anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: It's a mouse, it does its job. No lagging or glitching. I'd buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice mouse.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Update: due to operator error I wrote the below review. The company responded the next day and offered a full refund and showed me where the usb receiver was actually located in the battery compartment. The mouse works excellently is very comfortable on these old hands. I didn’t accept the refund because the mouse wasn’t faulty and an excellent mouse. Mouse is great and the company is as well. Their offer was well past the return date but still offered a refund and help. Thanks for the help.Nice mouse but totally useless with out the usb receiver. My computer was being used by a student. When she returned my computer I tried to setup the mouse. I looked up connecting and realized no usb receiver. Bought in December but just now (May 23) tried to connect. So disappointing. Won’t buy from this seller again. Overall it’s ergonomically comfortable and probably would work fine but I’ll never know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It fits really good in my hand, used for working and gaming, the extra buttons come in handy. For how cheap it was, I was expecting it to break in a week but it works like a charm, very smooth, weighs nothing, no issue connecting to different computers. It does feel like cheap plastic but maybe it is high quality. Needs 2 triple A batteries that are not included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Style and Speed
reviews.reviewText: So this mouse design overall is super comfortable and easy to use easy to get use too. It does last a long time after fully charged I could go days without having to charge it.The only thing is this mouse is NOT fast it’s on the slow side and my games require a faster mouse so I’m eventually going to be upgrading I just needed something cheap for the time being.Other than that if you don’t use it for gaming the mouse should be just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleeps faster than I'd like, but a good mouse
reviews.reviewText: This seems to go to sleep faster than I'd like. I haven't timed it, but it seems to be within 5 minutes or so. It feels comfortable to use and it works well. Overall a great mouse!
